_sText:
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>____Fixes_Now____<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

The controls are

Mouse1:  is to fly

W: is to move forward

S: is to move backword

A: is to turn left

D: is to turn right

Hit:  When you are going down be careful about the mouse1 like. If you let go. It will drop fast so keep clicking on the mouse1 to land

All the doors are done by a button and it will restart at 10 sec. then it will close.

PS: If you are going to but this on your map. Keep the Helicopter in the same way as it is. If you move it like right or left to change the view. I don't think the doors will open the right way. So you might have to fix it.

If you want to change things around you can.

The vmf and bps files are in.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>Have fun!!!!!<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
